meaning: spot, point, mark, speck, decimal point

onyomiExamples.meaning: dot, spot, point, speck, mark, mark (in an exam, etc.), grade, score, points, point (in a game), score, goal, run, point (in geometry), point, aspect, matter, detail, part, respect, way, viewpoint, (punctuation) mark (e.g. comma, period, decimal point), dot, "dot" stroke (in a Chinese character), counter for points, marks, goals, etc., counter for goods, items, articles of clothing, works of art, etc.

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to turn on, to switch on, to light up
to be lit (e.g. electricity comes on), to be lighted, to catch fire
to make tea (matcha), to perform the tea ceremony
to pour, to add (liquid), to serve (drinks), to put on (lipstick, etc.), to apply, to colour, to dye, to light (a fire), to burn
to light (a candle, lamp, etc.), to turn on (a light)
to light (a candle, lamp, etc.), to turn on (a light)
